mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_email, member_zipcode, member_add1, member_add2, member_contact1, member_contact2, member_interest, member_job ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAdd1}, #{memberAdd2}, #{memberContact1}, #{memberContact2}, #{memberInterest}, #{memberJob} )
mapper.update: update member set member_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where member_id = #{memberId}
